ability.Black Feather: This Pokemon acquires 3 Black Feather around it when switch-in. When taken damage from moves, takes 50% damage at cost of one Black Feather. If Black Feather is available, this Pokemon loses 1/8 its max HP at the end of each turn.
ability.Shadow Glide: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 2 stages if hit by a Physical move.

Dark Tempest.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the targetâ€™s Defense by 1 stage.

Wing Beat.effect: Has a 10% chance to flinch the target.

Shadow Claw.effect: Has a higher critical hit ratio.

Feather Storm.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by 2 stages.

Night Dive.effect: The user recovers half the HP lost by the target.
